name: Pidgey
fact: Pidgey can be found in forests and grasslands, and it has an excellent sense of direction.

name: Pidgeotto
fact: Pidgeotto uses its strong wings to create powerful gusts of wind that can knock over its opponents.

name: Pidgeot
fact: Pidgeot's speed and sharp vision make it a formidable aerial predator, capable of slicing through the air at high speeds.

name: Farfetch'd
fact: Farfetch'd carries a leek as a weapon and is known for its skill in using it during battles.

name: Doduo
fact: Doduo has two heads, each with its own brain, allowing it to be highly aware of its surroundings.

name: Dodrio
fact: Dodrio's three heads can act independently, allowing it to run at incredible speeds and attack from multiple directions.

name: Hoothoot
fact: Hoothoot's ability to rotate its head 180 degrees helps it keep a keen lookout for danger.

name: Noctowl
fact: Noctowl's wide eyes and ability to see in the dark make it an excellent night-time hunter.

name: Swablu
fact: Swablu's fluffy body resembles a cloud, and it can use its feathers to create a soft, soothing effect.

name: Altaria
fact: Altaria's wings can generate a beautiful, soft mist that it uses to protect itself and soothe others.

name: Spearow
fact: Spearow is known for its aggressive behavior and sharp beak, which it uses to peck at its enemies.

name: Fearow
fact: Fearow can create powerful shockwaves by flapping its wings, making it a fearsome predator in the skies.

name: Gliscor
fact: Gliscor uses its large wings and claws to glide silently and deliver surprise attacks.

name: Tornadus
fact: Tornadus's ability to control storms makes it a powerful and elusive Pok√©mon in the skies.

name: Thundurus
fact: Thundurus can generate and manipulate lightning, creating powerful electric attacks.
